text:
<@UR75SQMCZ> - Thank you for the quick reply and potential research tip.

I was neglecting open quantum systems simply because I haven't yet developed a simulation which demonstrates such a scenario which has been shown to be mathematically correct.

I'll take a look at the links you offered and see if I can mature my thinking and modeling of open quantum systems to exploit surrogates.

Thanks again!

text: <@U0158N77PFT> The “Quantum Measurement and Control” book by Wiseman and Milburn is pretty good (and describes quite a lot regarding the mathematical framework and derivations of quantum systems with a measurement)
